<h3 id="X38139">X(38139) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(5), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^5-(7*b^2-4*b*c+7*c^2)*a^4+6*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+2*(b+2*c)*(2*b+c)*(b-c)^2*a^2-8*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38139) = 5*X(5)-2*X(142) = 4*X(5)-X(31657) = 3*X(5)-X(38111) = X(7)-7*X(3851) = X(9)+2*X(546) = 8*X(142)-5*X(31657) = 6*X(142)-5*X(38111) = 4*X(142)-5*X(38171) = 7*X(21153)-9*X(38067) = X(21153)-9*X(38075) = 4*X(21153)-9*X(38082) = X(21153)-3*X(38108) = 2*X(21153)-3*X(38113) = 3*X(31657)-4*X(38111) = X(38067)-7*X(38075) = 4*X(38067)-7*X(38082) = 3*X(38067)-7*X(38108) = 6*X(38067)-7*X(38113) = 4*X(38075)-X(38082) = 3*X(38075)-X(38108) = 6*X(38075)-X(38113) = 2*X(38111)-3*X(38171)</b>
<p>X(38139) lies on these lines: {5,142}, {7,3851}, {9,546}, {30,21153}, {140,31672}, {144,3855}, {381,5762}, {382,18230}, {515,38043}, {516,3845}, {517,38158}, {518,38034}, {527,38071}, {547,38122}, {550,6666}, {952,38037}, {1503,38166}, {1656,36991}, {2801,38041}, {2829,38180}, {3091,5779}, {3545,38107}, {3564,38145}, {3627,31658}, {3628,5732}, {3832,31671}, {3839,21168}, {3843,5759}, {3850,5805}, {3858,18482}, {3859,5735}, {3947,15008}, {3988,20117}, {5055,21151}, {5066,5843}, {5068,36996}, {5587,24644}, {5690,16616}, {5719,5809}, {5842,38181}, {5844,38154}, {5853,38138}, {5856,38141}, {5857,38142}, {6173,11737}, {7988,38030}, {8226,31053}, {8232,12433}, {8581,10593}, {10592,14100}, {12618,28633}, {20195,35018}, {28146,38130}, {28160,38059}, {28174,38057}, {28186,38031}, {28202,38101}, {28212,38126}</p>
<p>
X(38139) = midpoint of X(381) and X(5817)<br>
X(38139) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (31657, 38171), (38113, 38108), (38122, 547), (38150, 5066), (38171, 5)<br>
X(38139) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38108, 38113, 38082), (38159, 38160, 38037)<br>
</p>
